content: 2008 single by Hady Mirza & Joi Chua (Chinese version) **Shine for Singapore** (晴空万里) is a song commissioned for Singapore's National Day Parade, 2008. It is sung by [Hady Mirza](/wiki/Hady_Mirza) in English, while it is sung by [Joi Chua](/wiki/Joi_Chua) in Mandarin. - NDP 2008 Theme Songs - Shine For Singapore MTV - Qing Kong Wan Li MTV This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Shine for Singapore
